core.name: Self-Optimizing UI Engine
core.description: Automatically refines UI layouts in real-time using live user interaction data and predictive analytics

core.name: Generative Design Variants
core.description: Creates 10+ design variations from a single sketch using AI, with interactive comparison metrics

core.name: Automated Design Validation
core.description: Auto-validates generated design variations against accessibility standards (WCAG 2.2) and brand guidelines using AI

supporting.name: Predictive Accessibility Fixer
supporting.description: Anticipates accessibility issues during design and auto-generates fixes before implementation

supporting.name: Dynamic Brand Consistency Engine
supporting.description: Enforces brand guidelines across all designs with AI-powered color/typography suggestions

supporting.name: Real-Time Collaboration Sync
supporting.description: Automatically synchronizes voice-driven edits (F018) with design changes across team workspaces

integration.name: Voice-Driven Design Collaboration
integration.description: Hands-free UI editing using natural language commands with real-time team voice annotations

integration.name: Cross-Platform Sync Matrix
integration.description: Automatic design consistency across web, mobile, and IoT interfaces with conflict-resolution AI

integration.name: Predictive UI Analytics Bridge
integration.description: Automatically maps heatmap interaction data (F021) to UI optimization suggestions in F014

analytics.name: Design Trend Forecasting
analytics.description: Uses machine learning to predict emerging UI trends and suggest proactive design adaptations

analytics.name: User Behavior Heatmap Synthesis
analytics.description: Generates predictive interaction maps by analyzing global design usage patterns

analytics.name: Trend-Driven Design Automation
analytics.description: Automatically applies forecasted design trends (F020) to UI variations in F015

future.name: Neurodesign Simulation
future.description: AI models cognitive load and attention patterns to optimize interface readability

future.name: Quantum UI Prototyping
future.description: Parallel design testing in simulated realities to identify optimal user experiences

future.name: Auto-Evolved Brand Guidelines
future.description: Machine-learning system that updates brand style guides based on cultural shifts and UX research
